reviews.review_msg: Professor Dasovic is a super funny prof and understands that us IS kids are NOT meant to take stats and research. Although lectures are pretty boring he gives you pretty clear cut definitions of all the terms you will need to know for the midterm and final. Expect lots of research projects throughout the semester.

Exams are your grade booster for this class. They are solely based on his lectures so make sure you attend them. His assignments are hell in order to survive them make sure you form a study group. Once you have a study group setup you should be okay. This class can be a GPA booster if you just put time and effort into it. Take only taking 3 classes

Unorganized & assignments were too long. Does provide help but replies r vague & by end of semester was unhelpfulignored students. Definitely make a study group becuz will take group effort to finish assignments. However exams were not too difficult just study lecture notes altho textbook provides examples. Try to get into TA tutorial & not his.
He doesn't just give answers away, he teaches you to think.

Engaging, great lecturer, and if you go to his office hours, very helpful. If you go out of your way to contact him, he's willing to go out of his way to help you. While he could be better organised, I feel like that's just because this was his first semester back after taking a break from teaching for a while. Loved taking IS 240 & IS 210 with him

For an extremely boring subject I had no interest in, Dasovic makes it better than tolerable. Some people react negatively to his style, he can bounce around a little, I personally like it. He tries hard to keep things more engaging, always answers questions, and is usually quick with email responses. The course itself = awful, Dasovic = great.

The fact negative comments are referring to him as a "teacher" just shows the intelligence level of people taking his classes. Dasovic is an amazing PROFESSOR. He wants you to do well and is incredibly helpful. Exams are very very fair and had the potential to be harder. Possible to get an A+.

People either love him or hate him... If you like teachers who are helpful and can guide you through material, DO NOT take his class. If you like teachers who are not totally clueless on the material they're teaching DO NOT take his class. You have been warned.

Not a very helpful teacher. Comes to class unprepared and has admitted to not knowing that much about 'R' (program he's teaching us to use). Showed up to our midterm 10 minutes late and half awake. If coding is not your thing and/or you'd much prefer a teacher who can actually guide you and help you understand the material, do not take his courses.

Absolutely Useless. Not only does he not come prepared to Labs/Tutorials/Sections, but he is incredibly unhelpful in providing even a shred of guidance. Condescending to his students, he is often rude and impatient, and tries to shift blame to his students even though it is he who cannot understand what he is trying to teach. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
